Infectum.turoyo: Kul yawmo u šaġolayḏi kogowǝl ḥamšo kise d xarč w ono gmoḥe<ne> mǝstaʕmalnalle/nanne İlyas bu bnoyo du šuro du bayto.

tokens.value: Kul yawmo u šaġolayḏi kogowǝl ḥamšo kise d xarč w ono gmoḥe<ne>
bu bnoyo du šuro du bayto.

Infectum.text: Kul yawmo u šaġolayḏi kogowǝl ḥamšo kise d xarč w ono gmoḥe<ne>, mǝstaʕmalnalle/nanne (İlyas) bu bnoyo du šuro du bayto.

translations: ‘Our worker every day mixes five sacks of cement and I throw <it|>, I used them (sacks) in the construction of the wall of the house.’

tokens.value: ‘Our worker every day mixes five sacks of cement and I throw <it|>, I used them (sacks) in the construction of the wall of the house.’

Infectum.text: ‘Our worker every day mixes five sacks of cement and I throw <it|>, I used them (sacks) in the construction of the wall of the house.’ (Iṣḥaq d Arkaḥ/Xarabale p.c);

Infectum.turoyo: İnaqla d kogawlat u xarč i čǝmǝnto u qum ʕam ḥḏoḏe kxulṭaṭ xulṭaṭṭe u bǝṯr gfǝtḥatle lu maġǝblo maǧǝblo u gmaḥtat maye ebe hul gšote am mayayḏe hedi madǝʕraṭle šafiro b ḏukṯe ʕal ḥḏoḏe hul d howe xud u tino towe ṭawwo xud u ṭino qašyo. Iṣḥaq d Arkaḥ p.c

tokens.value: i čǝmǝnto u qum ʕam ḥḏoḏe kxulṭaṭ
xulṭaṭṭe u bǝṯr gfǝtḥatle lu maġǝblo
maǧǝblo u gmaḥtat maye ebe hul gšote am mayayḏe hedi madǝʕraṭle šafiro b ḏukṯe ʕal ḥḏoḏe hul d howe xud u tino towe ṭawwo

Infectum.text: İnaqla d kogawlat u xarč, i čǝmǝnto u qum ʕam ḥḏoḏe kxulṭaṭ, xulṭaṭṭe u bǝṯr gfǝtḥatle lu maġǝblo, maǧǝblo u gmaḥtat maye ebe hul gšote am mayayḏe hedi madǝʕraṭle šafiro b ḏukṯe ʕal ḥḏoḏe hul d howe xud u tino towe ṭawwo, xud u ṭino qašyo. (Iṣḥaq d Arkaḥ p.c)

Infectum.turoyo: İnaqla d kogawlina u xarč d howe ġalabe zoyuḏo iḏa dlo mǝstaʕamlinale bu zabnayḏe xd glozǝm b zabno karyo gnošǝf w naqla ḥreto iḏa d maḥtina aʕle maye glayšinale me ḥaṯo elo lo kfoyǝš ebe ḥaylo xd inaqqa d bi qamayto mide d gmitaḥat aʕle tarte kore maye aw da ṯloṯ bu šǝklano hawxa. Iṣḥaq d Arkaḥ p.c

Infectum.text: İnaqla d kogawlina u xarč d howe ġalabe zoyuḏo iḏa dlo mǝstaʕamlinale bu zabnayḏe xd glozǝm b zabno karyo gnošǝf w naqla ḥreto iḏa d maḥtina aʕle maye glayšinale me ḥaṯo elo lo kfoyǝš ebe ḥaylo xd inaqqa d bi qamayto mide d gmitaḥat aʕle tarte kore maye aw da ṯloṯ bu šǝklano, hawxa. (Iṣḥaq d Arkaḥ p.c)

Preterit.turoyo: Hedi gmaḥtiwa aʕlayye ʕafro ṭino mgawliwa u ṭino bu ʕafrano. Howewa hawxa falqe saymiwayle falqe. 2018_07_01_ Arkaḥ old houses

tokens.value: mgawliwa u ṭino bu ʕafrano. Howewa hawxa falqe

Preterit.text: 060: Hedi gmaḥtiwa aʕlayye ʕafro, ṭino, mgawliwa u ṭino bu ʕafrano. Howewa hawxa falqe, saymiwayle falqe. (2018_07_01_01.2 Arkaḥ, old houses)

Preterit.turoyo: Then they used to put upon them qayse earth clay they used to mix the clay with this earth. They are resulted in this way lumps they made it ṭino-the clay into lumps.

tokens.value: Then they used to put upon them
they used to mix the clay with this earth. They are resulted in this way lumps

Preterit.text: 060:Then they used to put upon them (qayse) earth, clay, they used to mix the clay with this earth. They are resulted in this way lumps, they made it (ṭino-the clay) into lumps.
